extendedInfo.description: Hank (known from the game "Swamp Defense") fights his own battle against the monster breed. Kill as much monsters you can to beat your highscore. HowToPlay: Tap on the left or right side of Hank to move him. Get falling items for special weapons and assistance. Items: TimeBomb - place it with tapping on the screen 2nd Gun - Hank shoots with two guns for a while Defense Tower - shoots with rapid fire for a while Rocket Tower - shoots powerful rockets for a while Repair Kit - repair the fence Permission for Locations is only needed for Ad Provider (to show local Ads) If you have any problems with this game please write us, we try to fix it very fast! Also visit us at www.entwickler-x.de and www.facebook.com/entwicklerX Try our other games: Swamp Defense, A Frog Game, Blox, Dodge These Balls, Shuffleboard, River Pirates

reviews.title: Lotsa Fun
reviews.comment: Just rediscovered this gem recently. Easy controls, and gets seriously fast as the game progresses. I like trying to beat my best scores. Try it out...(23,640)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love Swamp Defense...same fun graphics, but I didn\'t care for the controls on this game.
